languages.text: "По праву, кажется, единственного, кто еще помнит о своем долге перед Императором в этом секторе! И на основании множество мерзких делишек, о которых мне все прекрасно известно!" {n}Голос Лорд-инквизитора лязгает оружейным затвором. Сжав губы в твердую линию, он устало и раздраженно произносит:{/n} "У меня нет времени для игр, фон Валанциус".

"By the right, it seems, of the sole person in this sector who still remembers his duty to the Emperor! And on the grounds of your numerous grubby little deeds, of which I have full knowledge!" {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice snaps out like a weapon bolt. Pressing his lips into a hard line, in a harried and vexed tone, he says,{/n} "I have no time for games, von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "По праву, кажется, единственного, кто еще помнит о своем долге перед Императором в этом секторе! И на основании множество мерзких делишек, о которых мне все прекрасно известно!" {n}Голос Лорд-инквизитора лязгает оружейным затвором. Pressing his lips into a hard line, in a harried and vexed tone, he says,{/n} "I have no time for games, von Valancius."

languages.text: “何来的权力？因为看起来，这片星区只有我一个人还牢记着对帝皇的责任，这就是我的权力！凭什么？凭你犯下的那无数卑劣的罪行，凭我对这些事情了如指掌！”{n}大审判官的声音铿锵有力，仿佛爆矢枪的弩矢一样。他抿紧了嘴唇，以疲惫不堪的恼怒语气继续说道。{/n}“我没时间陪你玩游戏，冯·瓦兰修斯。”
languages.original_text: "By the right, it seems, of the sole person in this sector who still remembers his duty to the Emperor! And on the grounds of your numerous grubby little deeds, of which I have full knowledge!" {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice snaps out like a weapon bolt. Pressing his lips into a hard line, in a harried and vexed tone, he says,{/n} "I have no time for games, von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: “何来的权力？因为看起来，这片星区只有我一个人还牢记着对帝皇的责任，这就是我的权力！凭什么？凭你犯下的那无数卑劣的罪行，凭我对这些事情了如指掌！”{n}审判长的声音铿锵有力，仿佛爆矢枪的弩矢一样。他抿紧了嘴唇，以疲惫不堪的恼怒语气继续说道。{/n}“我没时间陪你玩游戏，冯·瓦兰修斯。”

languages.text: «Por lo visto, ¡con el derecho de ser el único del sector que recuerda su deber hacia el Emperador! En cuanto al motivo, ¡me ha dado motivos de sobra y soy consciente de ellos!». {n}La voz del Lord Inquisidor retumba como el disparo de un bólter. Apretando los labios y en tono tenso y agotado, continúa:{/n} «No tengo tiempo para juegos, von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "By the right, it seems, of the sole person in this sector who still remembers his duty to the Emperor! And on the grounds of your numerous grubby little deeds, of which I have full knowledge!" {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice snaps out like a weapon bolt. Pressing his lips into a hard line, in a harried and vexed tone, he says,{/n} "I have no time for games, von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo visto, ¡con el derecho de ser el único del sector que recuerda su deber hacia el Emperador! En cuanto al motivo, ¡me ha dado motivos de sobra y soy consciente de ellos!». {n}La voz del Lord Inquisidor retumba como el disparo de un bólter. Apretando los labios y en tono tenso y agotado, continúa:{/n} «No tengo tiempo para juegos, von Valancius».

languages.text: 「権利というのなら、この宙域で唯一、皇帝への義務をまだ覚えている人間だからだろう！そしてその理由は、お前の数々の卑劣な行いにあり、そのすべてを私は熟知しているのだ！」{n}武器で掃射するかのように、ロード・インクィジターの声が鋭く響く。唇を固く一文字に結び、焦り苛ついた調子でカリゴスは続ける。{/n}「お遊びの時間はない、フォン・ヴァランシウス」
languages.original_text: "By the right, it seems, of the sole person in this sector who still remembers his duty to the Emperor! And on the grounds of your numerous grubby little deeds, of which I have full knowledge!" {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice snaps out like a weapon bolt. Pressing his lips into a hard line, in a harried and vexed tone, he says,{/n} "I have no time for games, von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: 「権利というのなら、この宙域で唯一、皇帝への義務をまだ覚えている人間だからだろう！そしてその理由は、お前の数々の卑劣な行いにあり、そのすべてを私は熟知しているのだ！」{n}武器で掃射するかのように、ロード・インクィジターの声が鋭く響く。唇を固く一文字に結び、焦り苛ついた調子でカリゴスは続ける。{/n}「お遊びの時間はない、フォン・ヴァランシウス」

languages.text: « Visiblement, le droit de la dernière personne de ce secteur à se rappeler son devoir envers l'Empereur ! N'allez pas croire que vos nombreux agissements sordides m'ont échappé ! » {n}La voix du seigneur inquisiteur retentit comme un coup de feu. Il serre les lèvres jusqu'à la blancheur et déclare sur un ton contrarié :{/n} « Je n'ai pas le temps de jouer, von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "By the right, it seems, of the sole person in this sector who still remembers his duty to the Emperor! And on the grounds of your numerous grubby little deeds, of which I have full knowledge!" {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice snaps out like a weapon bolt. Pressing his lips into a hard line, in a harried and vexed tone, he says,{/n} "I have no time for games, von Valancius."

traits.locale_text: « Visiblement, le droit de la dernière personne de ce secteur à se rappeler son devoir envers l'Empereur ! N'allez pas croire que vos nombreux agissements sordides m'ont échappé ! » {n}La voix du seigneur inquisiteur retentit comme un coup de feu. Il serre les lèvres jusqu'à la blancheur et déclare sur un ton contrarié :{/n} « Je n'ai pas le temps de jouer, von Valancius. »

languages.text: "Mit dem Recht der einzigen Person in diesem Sektor, die sich anscheinend noch an ihre Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperator erinnert! Und der Grund sind Eure zahlreichen kleinen zwielichtigen Aktionen, über dir ich voll informiert bin!" {n}Die Stimme des Großinquisitors schießt wie ein Waffenbolzen. Er presst seine Lippen zu einer schmalen Linie zusammen und sagt in gehetzt-verärgertem Ton:{/n} "Ich habe keine Zeit für Spielchen, von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "By the right, it seems, of the sole person in this sector who still remembers his duty to the Emperor! And on the grounds of your numerous grubby little deeds, of which I have full knowledge!" {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice snaps out like a weapon bolt. Pressing his lips into a hard line, in a harried and vexed tone, he says,{/n} "I have no time for games, von Valancius."

Er presst seine Lippen zu einer schmalen Linie zusammen und sagt in gehetzt-verärgertem Ton:{/n} "Ich habe keine Zeit für Spielchen, von Valancius."

languages.text: "Şu sektörde İmparator'a olan vazifesini unutmamış tek kişi olmanın hakkıyla herhâlde! Nasıl dediğim de belli: Sayısı meçhul onca pis işinden ötürü! Evet, hepsini biliyorum!" {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sesi, silahın sürgüsü kapanır gibi patlıyor. Dudaklarını bastırıp rahatsız ve telaşlı bir tonla konuşuyor.{/n} "Von Valancius, oyunlara ayıracak vaktim yok."
languages.original_text: "By the right, it seems, of the sole person in this sector who still remembers his duty to the Emperor! And on the grounds of your numerous grubby little deeds, of which I have full knowledge!" {n}The Lord Inquisitor's voice snaps out like a weapon bolt. Pressing his lips into a hard line, in a harried and vexed tone, he says,{/n} "I have no time for games, von Valancius."
